00036 #ifndef PACC_Timer_hpp
00037 #define PACC_Timer_hpp
00038 
00039 namespace PACC {
00040 
00057     class Timer {
00058      public:
00065         Timer(bool inHardware=true) : mHardware(inHardware), mCount(0) {
00066             if(mPeriod == 0) calibrateCountPeriod(); 
00067             reset();
00068         }
00069 
00071         void calibrateCountPeriod(unsigned int inDelay=10000, unsigned int inTimes=10);
00072 
00074         unsigned long long getCount(void) const;
00075 
00077         double getCountPeriod(void) const {return mPeriod;}
00078 
00080         double getValue(void) const {return (getCount()-mCount)*mPeriod;}
00081 
00083         void reset(void) {mCount = getCount();}
00084 
00085      protected:
00086         bool mHardware; 
00087         unsigned long long mCount; 
00088         static double mPeriod; 
00089     };
00090 
00091 } // end of PACC namespace
00092 
00093 #endif // PACC_Timer_hpp
